abstract: Microsoft and other sites and companies have troubleshooting steps to take if you click the Windows 10 Start button and nothing happens.
snippet: Microsoft and other sites and companies have troubleshooting steps to take if you click the Windows 10 Start button and nothing happens.
lead_paragraph: Q. I can’t even open my Start Menu in Windows 10 on my home computer, which makes it hard to troubleshoot the problem. How do I even begin?

headline.main: What to Try When the Start Menu Just Won’t Start
